Detailed Description

Entry point.

This class is the entry point to the game, and creates and manages the window, message pump, input, and rendering. The class is based off of code found in Jim Adams' Programming Role Playing Games with DirectX.

Member Function Documentation

BOOL Prototype::Init (  )  [virtual]

Called before the game enters the message pump.

This function initializes graphics and input devices, loads the main font,

Reimplemented from SystemCore.

BOOL Prototype::PerFrame (  )  [virtual]

Called each frame.

This function renders at 60FPS. It reads the input, updates the room/inventory, then renders the room/inventory.

Reimplemented from SystemCore.
